anya-e0401n2:1_8: Etena ‘vedanā bhedena cittacetasikānaṁ saṅgaho’tiādīsupi vedanā bhedena pavatto cittacetasikānaṁ saṅgahotiādinā sambandhaṁ dasseti.
anya-e0401n2:1_10: kathaṁ dassitoti āha “vedanā bhedena cittacetasikānaṁ saṅgaho”tiādi.
anya-e0401n2:1_13: Etena ayaṁ saṅgaho citta cetasikānaṁ eva saṅgahoti siddhaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n2:1_16: Etena upari vedanā saṅgahotiādīsu vedanāto saṅgaho vedanā saṅgaho. La.
anya-e0401n2:1_17: Vatthuto saṅgaho vatthu saṅgahoti siddhaṁ hoti,
anya-e0401n2:1_18: vedanātotiādīsu ca vedanā bhedatotiādi atthato siddhaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n2:1_22: “Saṅgaho nāma niyyate”ti vuttattā “nīto nāma atthī”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n2:1_24: Nanu tesaṁ “saṅgaho nāma niyyate”ti vuttattā dvīhi citta cetasikehi eva ayaṁ saṅgaho netabboti. Na.
anya-e0401n2:1_25: Cittena nīte cetasikehi visuṁ netabba kiccassa abhāvatoti dassetuṁ “citte pana siddhe”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n2:2_2: Vedanā bhedaṁ nissāya imassa saṅgahassa pavattattā “nissaya dhamma pariggahattha”nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n2:2_10: tasmā vedanā anubhavana lakkhaṇena tividhā eva hotīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n2:2_12: Upekkhaṁ sukhe saṅgahetvā sukhadukkhavasena vā dve vedanā vuttāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n2:2_13: “Santasmiṁ esā paṇīte sukhe”ti jhānasampayuttaṁ adukkhama sukhaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n2:2_14: Pañca bhedādīsu vitthāro vedanā saṁyutte gahetabbo.
anya-e0401n2:2_15: Vedayitanti ca vedanāti ca atthato ekaṁ.
anya-e0401n2:2_16: “Sabbaṁ taṁ dukkhasmiṁ”ti sabbaṁ taṁ vedayitaṁ dukkhasmiṁ eva paviṭṭhaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n2:2_17: Saṅkhāra dukkhataṁ ānanda mayā sandhāya bhāsitaṁ saṅkhāra vipariṇāmatañca,
anya-e0401n2:2_27: Tattha sukhasampayuttā dhammā kāyika sukha sampayutta cetasika sukha sampayutta vasena duvidhā.
anya-e0401n2:2_28: Evaṁ issaraṭṭhānabhūtānaṁ sampayutta dhammānaṁ duvidhattā anubhavana bhede tīsu vedanāsu ekaṁ sukha vedanaṁ
anya-e0401n2:2_33: Cakkhādi pasādakāyā nāma cakkhu sota ghāna jivhā pasādakāyā.
anya-e0401n2:2_34: Tesu nissitā nāma cakkhu viññāṇa cittuppādādayo.
anya-e0401n2:2_35: “Sabbhāvā”ti santabhāvato saṁvijjamāna bhāvato duvidhā hontīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n2:3_3: Suppatiṭṭhita bhāvasādhanaṁ hetu kiccaṁ nāmāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n2:3_6: Tasmā suppatiṭṭhita bhāvasādhanaṁ hetukiccaṁ nāmāti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n2:3_7: “Apare panā”ti paṭṭhānaṭṭha kathāyaṁ āgato revatatthera vādo.
anya-e0401n2:3_8: “Dhammānaṁ kusalādi bhāvasādhanaṁ”ti sahajātadhammānaṁ kusalabhāvasādhanaṁ akusalabhāvasādhanaṁ abyākatabhāvasādhanaṁ.
anya-e0401n2:3_10: “Yesa”nti mohamūla citta dvaye moho ca ahetuka cittuppāda rūpa nibbānāni ca.
anya-e0401n2:3_11: “Na sampajjeyyā”ti sahajāta hetuno abhāvā tassa mohassa akusala bhāvo,
anya-e0401n2:3_12: itare sañca abyākata bhāvo na sampajjeyya.
anya-e0401n2:3_14: Hetu nāma sahajāta dhammānaṁ kusalādibhāvaṁ sādhetīti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n2:3_16: so moho sampayutta dhammānaṁ akusala bhāvaṁ sādheyya.
anya-e0401n2:3_17: Attano pana akusala bhāvaṁ sādhento sahajāto añño hetu natthi.
anya-e0401n2:3_19: Tathā ahetuka cittuppāda rūpa nibbānānañca abyākatabhāvaṁ sādhento koci sahajāto hetu nāma natthīti tesampi abyākata bhāvo na sampajjeyya.
anya-e0401n2:3_23: Soca moho attano dhammatāya akusalo hoti.
anya-e0401n2:3_24: Tāni ca ahetuka cittuppādarūpa nibbānāni attano dhammatāya abyākatāni hontīti.
anya-e0401n2:3_27: Tathā aññepi dhammā attano dhammatāya eva kusalā kusalā byākatā bhavissanti.
anya-e0401n2:3_29: yenakāraṇena te eva dhammā attano dhammatāya akusalā byākatā honti.
anya-e0401n2:3_30: Aññe pana dhammā attano dhammatāya kusalā kusalā byākatā na honti,
anya-e0401n2:3_32: Tasmā tesaṁ sabbesampi kusalādi bhāvatthāya hetūhi payojanaṁ natthi.
anya-e0401n2:3_33: Tasmā so theravādo na yutto yevāti.
anya-e0401n2:3_34: Na kevalañca tasmiṁ theravāde ettako doso atthi.
anya-e0401n2:3_35: Atha kho aññopi doso atthīti dassetuṁ “yāni cā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n2:3_37: Sace dhammānaṁ kusalādi bhāvo sahajāta hetuppaṭibaddho siyā.
anya-e0401n2:3_39: hetu paccaye kusala hetuto laddha paccayāni rūpāni kusalāni bhaveyyuṁ.
anya-e0401n2:3_40: Akusala hetuto laddha paccayāni rūpāni akusalāni bhaveyyuṁ.
anya-e0401n2:3_50: Pāpa dhamma pāpā rammaṇa virodho nāma kāmarāgaṭṭhānīyehi sattavidha methuna dhammādīhi pāpa dhammehi
anya-e0401n2:3_51: ceva pañcakāmaguṇā rammaṇe hi ca cittassa virodho,
anya-e0401n2:3_53: Muyhanakiriyā pana ekanta akusala jātikā eva hoti.
anya-e0401n2:3_54: Ettāvatā mohamūla citta dvaye moho attano dhammatāya akusalo hotīti imamatthaṁ patiṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0401n2:3_56: Idāni ahetuka cittuppāda rūpa nibbānāni attano dhammatāya abyākatāni hontīti imamatthaṁ patiṭṭhāpetuṁ “yoca dhammo”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n2:3_59: Attano dhammatāya eva siddho. Ettāvatā- ahetuka. La.
anya-e0401n2:3_63: Idāni sabbopi moho attano dhammatāya akusala bhāveṭhatvā aññesaṁ icchā nāma atthi,
anya-e0401n2:3_64: akkhanti nāma atthīti evaṁ vuttānaṁ icchā akkhanti dhammānampi akusala bhāvaṁ sādhetīti dassetuṁ “tattha moho”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n2:3_66: Na kevalaṁ so lobhādīnaṁ akusalabhāvaṁ sādheti,
anya-e0401n2:3_67: atha kho alobhādīnampi kusalabhāvaṁ so eva sādhetīti dassetuṁ “alobhādīnañcā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n2:3_68: “Avijjānusayena saheva siddho”ti tāni sattasantāne avijjānusaye appahīne kusalāni honti.
anya-e0401n2:3_70: Idāni lobha dosānaṁ alobhādīnañca hetu kiccaṁ dassetuṁ “tāni pana lobhādīnī”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n2:3_73: Arajjana adussana amuyhanānaṁ nissandāni arajjanādi nissandāni.
anya-e0401n2:3_75: “Hetumukhenapī”ti ahetuka cittuppāda rūpa nibbānānaṁ abyākatabhāvo attano dhammatāya siddhoti vutto.
anya-e0401n2:3_76: Sahetuka vipāka kriyānaṁ abyākata bhāvo pana attano dhammatāya siddhotipi sahajāta hetūnaṁ hetu kiccena siddhotipi vattuṁ vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n2:3_79: Atha tesaṁ kusalādi bhāvo sesasampayutta hetuppaṭi baddho siyāti yojanā.
anya-e0401n2:3_84: Idāni ‘yāni ca laddhahetu paccayānī’tiādi vacanaṁ paṭikkhipanto “yathācā”tiādimāha.
anya-e0401n2:3_89: kasmā te rūpa dhammā jhānapaccayuppannesu vuttāti āha “te panā”tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n2:3_91: “Taṁ pana tesaṁ”ti tesaṁ haṁsādīnaṁ taṁ vaṇṇavisesaṁ.
anya-e0401n2:3_93: “Abyākatānaṁ panāti sabbaṁ”ti abyākatānaṁ pana abyākatabhāvo niranusaya santānappaṭi baddho,
anya-e0401n2:3_95: avipākabhāvappaṭi baddho cāti daṭṭhabbanti idaṁ sabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n2:3_96: “Vutta pakkhepatati yevā”ti tasmiṁ pakkhe antogadhamevāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n2:4_5: “Bhavantarādippaṭi sandhāna vasenā”ti bhavantarassa ādikoṭiyā paṭisandhāna vasena.
anya-e0401n2:4_8: “Avicchedappavatti paccayaṅgabhāvenā”ti avicchedappavattiyā padhāna paccaya saṅkhātena aṅgabhāvena.
anya-e0401n2:4_22: “Ekāvajjana parikamma cittato”ti maggena vā abhiññāya vā ekaṁ samānaṁ āvajjanaṁ assāti viggaho.
anya-e0401n2:4_25: gotrabhū,ti ettha parikamma javanacittaṁ idha parikamma cittanti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n2:4_28: “Dīghaṁ addhānaṁ”ti sakalarattiyaṁ vā sakala divasaṁ vā niddokkamana vasena dīghaṁ kālaṁ.
anya-e0401n2:4_31: Kālohi nāma visuṁ cittassa ārammaṇa bhūto eko paññatti dhammoti etena kālo nāma sabhāvato avijjamānattā
anya-e0401n2:4_32: kathaṁ kiccānaṁ pavattiṭṭhānaṁ nāma sakkā bhavitunti imaṁ āsaṅkaṁ visodheti.
anya-e0401n2:4_33: “Itarathā”ti tathā aggahetvā aññathā kiccaṭṭhānānaṁ abhede gahite satīti attho.
anya-e0401n2:4_34: “Sayaṁ somanassa yuttaṁpī”ti kadāci sayaṁ somanassa yuttaṁpi.
anya-e0401n2:4_37: “Āsevana bhāva rahitaṁ pī”ti āsevana guṇa rahitampi.
anya-e0401n2:4_38: Tañhi āsevana paccaye paccayopi na hoti,
anya-e0401n2:4_40: “Parikamma bhāvanā balena ca pavattattā”ti idaṁ phalasamāpatti vīthiyaṁ phalajavanesu pākaṭaṁ.
anya-e0401n2:5_5: “Kammavisesa mahābhūta visesa siddhenā”ti ettha kammavisesena ca mahābhūta visesena ca siddhoti viggaho.
anya-e0401n2:5_10: “Visaya visayī bhāvūpagamanassā”ti ettha rūpa nimittānaṁ visayabhāvassa upagamanaṁ nāma cakkhu maṇḍe āpātāgamanaṁ vuccati.
anya-e0401n2:5_11: Āvajjanādīnaṁ visayī bhāvassa upagamanaṁ nāma tesaṁ nimittānaṁ ārammaṇa karaṇaṁ vuccati.
anya-e0401n2:5_13: Evaṁ dvāra saddassa karaṇa sādhanayuttiṁ dassetvā idāni adhikaraṇa sādhana yuttiṁ dasseti “athavā”tiādinā.
anya-e0401n2:5_15: “Cakkhumeva cakkhu dvāra”nti etena cakkhumeva dvāraṁ cakkhu dvāranti avadhāraṇa samāsaṁ dasseti.
anya-e0401n2:5_17: Sabbaṁ ekūna navutividhaṁ cittaṁ manodvārameva nāma hoti.
anya-e0401n2:5_18: Tathāhi vuttaṁ aṭṭhasāliniyaṁ ayaṁ nāmamano manodvāraṁ nāma na hotīti na vattabboti.
anya-e0401n2:5_23: “Tattheva taṁ yuttaṁ”ti tasmiṁ pāḷippadese eva taṁ sādhaka vacanaṁ yuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n2:5_25: “Manañcāti etthā”ti manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇaṁti vākye manañcātipade.
anya-e0401n2:5_26: Tattha pana javana manoviññāṇassa uppattiyā catūsu paccayesu manañcāti ettha dvārabhūtaṁ bhavaṅgamano ca āvajjana mano cāti dve paccayā labbhanti.
anya-e0401n2:5_27: Dhamme cāti pade dhammārammaṇa saṅkhāto eko paccayo labbhati.
anya-e0401n2:5_31: “Sannihita paccayānaṁ eva tattha adhippetattā”ti paṭicca saddasāmatthiyena āsanne dharamānapaccayānaṁ eva tasmiṁ pāḷivākye adhippetattā.
anya-e0401n2:5_32: “Dvārabhāvārahassā”ti visaya visayīnaṁ vutta nayena pavatti mukhabhāvārahassa.
anya-e0401n2:5_33: Etena ārammaṇāni āpātaṁ āgacchantu vā, māvā,
anya-e0401n2:5_36: Pabhassarappasannabhāvena dvārabhāvā rahatā eva pamāṇanti dīpeti.
anya-e0401n2:5_38: Dvāravikāra mūlakāni tādisāni kiccāni yesaṁ tāni taṁ kiccavantāni.
anya-e0401n2:5_41: Vibhāvani pāṭhe “manodvāra saṅkhāta bhavaṅgato”ti manodvāra saṅkhāta bhavaṅga bhāvato ca.
anya-e0401n2:5_42: “Ārammaṇantaraggahaṇavasena appavattito”ti paṭisandhi cittena yathā gahitaṁ kammakammanimittādikaṁ ārammaṇaṁ
anya-e0401n2:5_43: muñcitvā pavattikāle chasu dvāresu āpātāgatassa ārammaṇantarassa gahaṇa vasena appavattito ca.
anya-e0401n2:5_44: Heṭṭhāpi pañcadvārā vajjana cakkhu viññāṇa sampaṭicchana santīraṇa voṭṭhabbana kāmāvacarajavana tadā rammaṇa vasenātiādinā kiccasīseneva. La. Vutto.
anya-e0401n2:5_45: Etthahi āvajjana sampaṭicchanādīni kicca visesānaṁ nāmāni honti.
anya-e0401n2:5_48: “Tathā assutattā”ti ekūna vīsati dvāra vimuttānīti ca,
anya-e0401n2:5_49: cha dvārikāni ceva dvāra vimuttānīti ca,
anya-e0401n2:5_50: mahaggata vipākāni dvāra vimuttāne vāti ca, sutaṁ.
anya-e0401n2:6_2: “Dubbala purisenā”ti gelaññābhibhūtattā vā jarābhibhūtattā vā daṇḍena vā rajjukena vā vinā uṭṭhātumpi
anya-e0401n2:6_3: patiṭṭhātumpi aparāparaṁ gantumpi asakkontena dubbala purisena daṇḍakaṁ vā rajjukaṁ vā ālambiyati.
anya-e0401n2:6_8: “Āgantvā”ti ārammaṇa karaṇa vasena tato tato āgantvā.
anya-e0401n2:6_12: Tāni ettha āgantvā ramantīti etasmiṁ atthe sati,
anya-e0401n2:6_15: Evañca sati ekaṁ padaṁ dvīhivākyehi dassanaṁ na sundaranti.
anya-e0401n2:6_21: “Anāgataṁ”ti ettha na kāro avatthā vasena paṭisedho.
anya-e0401n2:6_22: Yo dhammo paccaya sāmaggiyaṁ sati āgamana jātiko uppajjana sīlo.
anya-e0401n2:6_26: nāgacchati nāgacchitthāti iminā atthena so anāgato nāma.
anya-e0401n2:6_27: Nibbāna paññattiyo pana āgamana jātikā na honti.
anya-e0401n2:6_31: Te yadā vattabba pakkhe tiṭṭhantīti sambandho.
anya-e0401n2:6_34: “Na tathā imesaṁ”ti imesaṁ dvāra vimuttānaṁ ārammaṇaṁ pana tathā na hotīti yojanā.
anya-e0401n2:6_38: “Ekavajjana vīthiyaṁ aggahita bhāvo idha na pamāṇa”nti cha dvāraggahitanti idha appamāṇaṁ.
anya-e0401n2:6_40: “Kālavimutta sāmaññaṁ”vāti yaṁ kiñcikāla vimuttaṁ vā na hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n2:6_47: “Cha hi dvārehī”ti karaṇa bhūtehi chahi cakkhādi dvārehi.
anya-e0401n2:6_48: “Maraṇāsanna javanehī”ti kattu bhūtehi maraṇāsanne pavattehi cha dvārika javanehi.
anya-e0401n2:6_51: “Kenaci dvārena aggahitameva hotī”ti ettha asaññī bhavato cutānaṁ sattānaṁ kāmapaṭisandhiyā kammādi ārammaṇaṁ
anya-e0401n2:6_52: bhavantare kenaci dvārena aggahitanti yuttaṁ. Kasmā,
anya-e0401n2:6_54: Arūpabhavato cutānaṁ pana kāmapaṭisandhiyā gati nimitta sammataṁ ārammaṇaṁ kathaṁ bhavantare kenaci dvārena aggahitaṁ bhaveyya,
anya-e0401n2:6_55: manodvāraggahitameva bhaveyyāti imaṁ codanaṁ visodhetuṁ “ettha ca yasmā paṭṭhāne”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n2:6_60: Paresaṁ payoga balenāpi kammādīnaṁ upaṭṭhānaṁ nāma hotītiādinā yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n2:6_61: “Suṭṭhu āsevitānaṁ”ti cirakālaṁ saṅgha vatta cetiyavatta karaṇādivasena taṁ taṁ bhāvanā kammavasena ca suṭṭhu āsevitānaṁ kammakammanimittānaṁ.
anya-e0401n2:6_64: Tadāpi nirayapālehi dassitaṁ taṁ taṁ gati nimittaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā cavanti.
anya-e0401n2:6_66: Nanu nirayapālā nāma tāvatiṁsā bhavanaṁ gantuṁ na sakkuṇeyyunti.
anya-e0401n2:6_72: “Kāmapaṭisandhiyā ārammaṇaṁ”ti tehi nimittārammaṇehi aññaṁ upacāra bhāvanā kammaṁ vā yaṁ kiñci anurūpaṁ gati nimittaṁ vā.
anya-e0401n2:6_73: “Tāneva nimittāni gahetvā”ti vacanena tāni nimittāni maraṇāsanna javanehi gahitānīti dasseti.
anya-e0401n2:6_74: Tāni ca paññatti dhammattā kāmapaṭisandhiyā ārammaṇaṁ na hontīti.
anya-e0401n2:6_75: “Paccuppannagati nimitte siddhe siddhamevā”ti tasmiṁ bhave gatassa tattha yāvajīvampi anu bhavitabbaṁ
anya-e0401n2:6_76: ārammaṇaṁ nāma tasmiṁ khaṇe dharamānaṁ paccuppannampi atthi.
anya-e0401n2:6_78: Tattha paccuppanne upaṭṭhahante paṭisandhiyā ārammaṇaṁ sampajjati.
anya-e0401n2:6_79: Anāgataṁ pana anupaṭṭhahantampi paccuppanne antogadhasadisaṁ hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0401n2:6_80: Vibhāvani pāṭhena ca paccuppanna gatinimittaṁ viya āpātamāgataṁ, kasmā,
anya-e0401n2:6_87: Yaṁ kālamakarīmunīti vuttattā sabbaññu buddhādīnaṁ parinibbāna cuti cittaṁ santi lakkhaṇaṁ nibbānaṁ ārammaṇaṁ karotīti.
anya-e0401n2:6_88: Taṁ sabbathāpi kāmāvacarā lambaṇā nevāti iminā apanetabbanti dassetuṁ “tā nihi sabbaññu buddhānaṁ uppannāni pī”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0401n2:6_90: “Tānī”ti dvādasā kusala cittāni aṭṭhañāṇa vippayutta kusala kriya javanāni ca.
anya-e0401n2:6_91: Ajjhāna lābhino puthujjanā mahaggatajjhānānipi ālambituṁ na sakkontīti vuttaṁ “paññattiyā saha kāmāvacarā rammaṇānī”ti.
anya-e0401n2:6_92: “Tāne vā”ti ñāṇa sampayutta kāma kusalāni eva.
anya-e0401n2:6_94: Heṭṭhima phalaṭṭhānaṁ tāneva attanā adhigata maggaphala nibbānā rammaṇāni.
anya-e0401n2:6_95: “Jhānāni patthentī”ti āyatiṁ jhānalābhino bhaveyyāmāti patthanaṁ karonti.
anya-e0401n2:7_3: Tāni nissaya vatthūni yesaṁ tāni tabbatthukāni.
anya-e0401n2:7_4: “Tesañca saddo na yujjatī”ti tesaṁ vāde ca saddo na yujjati.
anya-e0401n2:7_5: Na hi alutta ca kāraṁ dvanda padaṁ nāma atthīti.
anya-e0401n2:7_6: “Pubbapadesu ānetabbo”ti cakkhu vatthu ca sotavatthu cātiādinā ānetabbo.
anya-e0401n2:7_8: Na hi samāsa padato eka desaṁ aññattha ānetuṁ yujjatīti.
anya-e0401n2:7_9: Avibhattika niddeso nāma cakkhuṁ, sotaṁ, ghānaṁ, jivhā, kāyo, hadayaṁ,
anya-e0401n2:7_10: vatthu cāti vattabbe pubbapadesu avibhattika niddeso.
anya-e0401n2:7_11: Evañcasati vatthu saddo ca saddo ca pubbapadesu ānetuṁ labbhantīti.
anya-e0401n2:7_12: Kāmataṇhāya adhīnena āyattena kāmāvacara kammena nibbattā kāmataṇhādhīna kamma nibbattā.
anya-e0401n2:7_18: Sabbesaṁ dassana kiccānaṁ majjhe buddha dassanā divasena anuttaraṁ dassanaṁ janetīti dassanānuttariyaṁ.
anya-e0401n2:7_19: Evaṁ savanānuttariyepi catusacca dhammassavanā divasenāti vattabbaṁ.
anya-e0401n2:7_20: “Ajjhatta bahiddha santā nesu pī”ti ajjhatta santānepi bahiddha santānepi.
anya-e0401n2:7_21: “Suddhe”ti kenaci ālokena ca andhakārena ca virahite.
anya-e0401n2:7_27: Tañca vijānanaṁ tīsu manodhātūsu natthīti vuttaṁ “vijānana kiccābhāvato”ti.
anya-e0401n2:7_30: Sampaṭicchana kiccañca pañcaviññāṇehi yathā gahitāneva pañcārammaṇāni sampaṭicchana mattaṁ hoti.
anya-e0401n2:7_31: Tenāha “visesajānana kiccāni na hontī”ti. Dassanaṁ, savanaṁ, ghāyanaṁ, sāyanaṁ, phusana,
anya-e0401n2:7_32: nti imāni kiccāni thokaṁ visesa jānana kiccāni hontīti vuttaṁ “paccakkhato dassanā divasenā”tiādiṁ.
anya-e0401n2:7_35: Avasesā pana santīraṇādayo manoviññāṇadhātuyo nāmāti sambandho.
anya-e0401n2:7_36: Nanu mananaṭṭhena mano ca taṁ vijānanaṭṭhena viññāṇañcāti vuttepi pañcaviññāṇehi viseso natthīti āha “atissaya visesa jānana dhātuyoti attho”ti.
anya-e0401n2:7_37: Evaṁ santepi so attho saddayuttiyā siddho na hoti.
anya-e0401n2:7_38: Yadicchā vasena vutto hotīti āha “pariyāya padānaṁ”tiādi.
anya-e0401n2:7_39: Etena so attho saddayuttiyā eva siddho.
anya-e0401n2:7_41: “Visesana samāse”ti mano ca taṁ viññāṇañcāti manoviññāṇanti evarūpe kammadhāraya samāse.
anya-e0401n2:7_42: “Padaṭṭhānaṁ”ti ettha padanti ca ṭhānanti ca kāraṇattha vacanāni,
anya-e0401n2:7_44: Padañca taṁ ṭhānañcāti vutte atissaya kāraṇanti attho viññāyati.
anya-e0401n2:7_49: “Katthaci dissati yujjati cā”ti na hi katthaci dissati ca.
anya-e0401n2:7_52: “Manaso viññāṇaṁ”ti ettha paṭisandhi cittato paṭṭhāya yāvacuti cittā antare sabbaṁ citta santānaṁ satta
anya-e0401n2:7_53: viññāṇa dhātūnaṁ vasena vibhāgaṁ katvā attho vattabbo.
anya-e0401n2:7_54: Pañcadvārā vajjanañca sampaṭicchana dvayañca manodhātu mattattā mano nāma.
anya-e0401n2:7_56: Avasesāni sabbāni viññāṇāni manassa viññāṇanti atthena manoviññāṇāni nāma.
anya-e0401n2:7_57: Tattha “manassa viññāṇaṁ”ti anantara paccaya bhūtassa vā manassa paccayuppanna bhūtaṁ viññāṇaṁ.
anya-e0401n2:7_59: Santīraṇato paṭṭhāya yāva dvārantare pañcadvārā vajjanaṁ nāgacchati,
anya-e0401n2:7_60: tāva antare sabbaṁ manoviññāṇa santānaṁ paccayuppanna viññāṇaṁ nāma.
anya-e0401n2:7_61: Puna “manassa viññāṇa”nti paccayuppanna bhūtassa manassa paccaya bhūtaṁ viññāṇaṁ.
anya-e0401n2:7_62: Ettha pañcadvārā vajjanaṁ paccayuppanna mano nāma.
anya-e0401n2:7_63: Tato pure sabbaṁ manoviññāṇa santānaṁ paccaya mano nāma.
anya-e0401n2:7_66: “Manoviññāṇadhātu bhāvaṁ sambhāvetī”ti avasesā pana dhammā manoviññāṇadhātu ca nāma honti,
anya-e0401n2:7_67: hadaya vatthuñca nissāyayeva vattantīti evaṁ tesaṁ dhammānaṁ manoviññāṇadhātu bhāvañca sambhāveti, vaṇṇeti.
anya-e0401n2:7_71: Dutīyajjhāne eva aparisesa nirodha vacanaṁ viruddhaṁ siyā. Kathaṁ,
anya-e0401n2:7_72: sace paṭigho anīvaraṇā vattho nāma natthi.
anya-e0401n2:7_73: Pathamajjhānato pubbe eva so niruddho siyā.
anya-e0401n2:7_79: “Purima kāraṇamevā”ti anīvaraṇā vatthassa paṭighassa abhāvatoti kāraṇaṁ eva.
anya-e0401n2:7_80: Paratoghoso nāma sāvakānaṁ sammādiṭṭhippaṭilābhāya padhāna paccayo hoti.
anya-e0401n2:7_83: buddhā ca pacceka sambuddhā ca sayambhuno parato ghosena vinā dhammaṁ paṭivijjhanti.
